statements.sql: select count(*) as aggregate from `campaigns` where `code` = 'cbrevo#6'
select count(*) as aggregate from `campaigns` where `code` = 'cbrevo#5'

insert into `campaigns` (`code`, `name`, `subject`, `previewText`, `htmlContent`, `local`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('cbrevo#5', 'ItsCRMCampanha', 'ItsCRM é o novo CRM da Its Possible', 'Venha conhecer o novo CRM da Its Possible', '\nItsCRM é o novo CRM da Its Possible

Parabéns [<User.Name>]! Um Dia Feliz

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua. At vero eos et accusam et justo duo dolores et ea rebum.

Register for a webinar

Feature the date and time, like this:

 

Tuesday, April 17 at 9:30 a.m. EST

 

Briefly describe the benefit of attending the event, such as what attendees will learn or gain.

 

Briefly describe the speaker or host, such as why they are credible or what they offer attendees. Mention the topics or agenda that will be covered, perhaps:

  • using bullet points
  • to make them easy to read
  • three bullet points are a good number

 

Finally, invite people to register for the event. Remember to add a registration link to the button below.
Register Now

Urbiwise - Property Markets Analytics, Lda

Alameda dos Oceanos, Nº 27 - Escritório 3, 1990-197, Lisboa

Este e-mail foi enviado para {{contact.EMAIL}}

Você o recebeu porque se inscreveu em nossa newsletter.

Visualizar no navegador| Cancelar subscrição
\n', 'brevo', '2024-03-12 15:37:46', '2024-03-12 15:37:46')
